title: Game Tiles: Basic Tile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user launching MLB APP
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Scores page
custom_expected:
THEN the user can see the Game Tiles with game start time for the scheduled games

AND the user can see the Game Tiles with live game data

AND the user can see the Game Tiles with the final game details

title: Game Tiles: MLB Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is a free game of the day AND the game is in a live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a Free Game Of The Day tag will appear on the game tile.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is a free game of the day AND the game is in a final state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a Free Game Of The Day tag will appear on the unselected game tile AND will not appear on a focused tile that contains a Saving pitcher

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is a free game of the day AND the game is in a pregame state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a Free Game Of The Day tag will appear on the game tile.

title: Select Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the date of the Scoreboard is today’s date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show the date’s text as “Today’s Games”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the date of the Scoreboard is not today’s date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN show the date as (Day of the week, Month and Day) 
AND a “Today” button will appear for the user to navigate back to today’s date

title: Calendar View - Show Games per Day
custom_steps: WHEN I have landed in the calendar view
custom_expected:
THEN display a calendar grid view of the month
AND display number of games per day on each date

title: Calendar Picker Month View
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has opened the date picker
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on a date tile
custom_expected: THEN the app will navigate back to the scoreboard on the selected date

title: Season Over
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the season is over
custom_steps: WHEN the scoreboard loads and a user clicks on the date to display the date picker
custom_expected: THEN the date picker should display either the last date of the previous season or the first day of the next season, depending on what is populated in https://storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/scoreboardflip.json in nextDatePresented value (NOTE: This should occur on the first visit to the Games page. If the user navigates to another date on the games page and then leaves, the date to which they navigated should be preserved.)

title: Today button not on Today's date
custom_steps: WHEN I am on today's date on the scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN The Today button should not appear in the top menu next to the date picker
AND it should remain hidden if I scroll up and down on the Score page for today

title: Game Tile: YouTube Free Game of the Week - Automated
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps: WHEN there is a YouTube game of the week
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a branded youtube experience the feed select

title: Game Tile: Blackout Market
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I land on the games page
AND I am blacked out of a game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can see the Blackout Flag in the game tile.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is blacked out
AND live
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can see the Blackout Flag in the game tile.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is blacked out
AND in the future
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can see the Blackout Flag in the game tile.

title: Navigate between days on Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user of the TV app is viewing the scoreboard (Games page)
custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigated to a date other than the current date
custom_expected:
THEN the scoreboard displays the games on that date
AND those games do not change (Wait for a while on the page to insure games do not change)

title: Calendar View - Incorporate Seasons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has landed on the calendar 
AND configured seasons are available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is at the last month of a season range
AND the user navigates to a later month
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN skip forward to the first month of next season

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is at the first month of a season range
AND the user navigates to a previous month
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN skip backwards to the last month of the previous season

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the earliest month of all configured seasons
WHEN the user is on the last month of all seasons
